title: Header InjectionFile DisclosureFile
extract: In football, a header is the act of hitting the ball in a particular direction with your head. 2. countable noun. A header is text such as a name or a page number that can be automatically displayed at the top of each page of a printed document. Compare footer.
extract_html: In football, a header is the act of hitting the ball in a particular direction with your head. 2. countable noun. A header is text such as a name or a page number that can be automatically displayed at the top of each page of a printed document. Compare footer.
